name: domsanitizer
description: A template to parsable tree transformer used to produce valid HTML content.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup && npm run test && npm run min
scripts.rollup: rollup --config rollup.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/exports.default = index;/return index;/' index.js && rm index.js.bck
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
